entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Target net10.0 in RepoTasks #58823
  • Logout doesn't work in Blazor Web Application with global WASM interactivity (AntiforgeryValidationException) #58822
  • [Blazor] Unuseful message when calling InvokeAsync() #58821
  • [Blazor] Built-in components improvements #58819
  • [Blazor] Lazy loading improvements for Webassembly #58818
  • [Blazor] Challenge or equivalent API to help with auth in interactive scenarios #58817
  • [Blazor] NavigationManager.NotFound or equivalent API for SSR #58816
  • [Blazor] Add a way to specify a page as the Notfound fragment #58815
  • [Blazor] Pass assemblies registered in MapComponents to the Router component automatically. #58814
  • Blazor Streaming Rendering does not show intermediate state when @attribute [Authorize(Roles = "group1")] is used #58813
  • Event-like extensions for authentication. #58812
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] Improving ASP.NET Core integration #58811
    Backlog
  • OpenAPI polymorphic response without base class #58810

Closed

  • AOT warnings on minimal API Map* methods outside of Program.cs, especially in web library projects #58678
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #58803

PullRequests

Created

  • Set up Windows installer build for the VMR #58820
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update Router.cs #57559
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/2.3] Always build modules #58809
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24553.6 #58776
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add examples to AddOpenApi extension method/overloads #58808
    feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Fix local failure in GET_GracefulServerShutdown_AbortRequestsAfterHostTimeout #58747
    area-networking
  • Remove RequiresUnreferencedCode in IJSInProcessObjectReference #58713
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Support returning OpenAPI document in YAML from MapOpenApi #58616
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
